Class BasicRolesPepUnauthenticatedUserIT

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fcrepo.auth.roles.common.integration.AbstractRolesIT

  • public class BasicRolesPepUnauthenticatedUserIT
extends AbstractBasicRolesIT
    Verifies that role for unauthenticated users is properly enforced.
    Author:
    Scott Prater, Gregory Jansen
